summary: Completed comprehensive testing of recurring correctives analytics feature. Backend API and frontend integration working correctly with proper data display.
passed_tests: Backend API /api/analytics/recurring-correctives returns correct data structure
API response includes machines_with_recurring, top_recurring_issues, and summary fields
Frontend displays 'Correctivos más Repetidos (Top 10)' chart with machine data
Chart shows EMPANADORA MECALSA and Test Machine with proper recurring issue counts
Frontend displays 'Detalle por Máquina - Averías Recurrentes' section
Machine details show proper structure: machine name, department, recurring issues count
Individual issues display: title, description, failure cause, repetition count
EMPANADORA MECALSA shows 3 recurring issues: Vibración excesiva (4x), Fallo motor eléctrico (3x), Fuga de aceite (2x)
Test Machine shows 1 recurring issue: Fallo Motor Principal (2x)
All required text elements present on Analytics page
No error messages found during testing
Analytics page navigation and tab switching working correctly
